document.full_text: the memphis grizzlies recovered from a dismal first half to beat the oklahoma city thunder 95-83 and force a game seven in their nba western conference semi-final series.
document.title: grizzlies rally from poor start to force game seven
lines_and_colors: the memphis grizzlies recovered from a dismal first half to beat the oklahoma city thunder 95-83 and force a game seven in their nba western conference semi-final series.
